alert.note: Alert for Cascade County below 5000ft; Gates of the Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 8:35AM MST until December 25 at 12:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Gates of the Mountains and Cascade County below 5000ft. * WHEN...Until Midnight MST tonight. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility, while drifting snow could lead to partial lane blockages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...In addition, some light rain may fall Saturday evening. While air temperatures may be above freezing, rain may still freeze on contact with the frozen ground.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Cascade County below 5000ft; Gates of the Mountains
